creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: two-sided fan: two groups of three conical, minimalist evergreens; evergreens have dark brown trunks with moss; opposite side: minimalist landscape of mountains in silver and gold pigment
text: This folding paper fan is decorated with two groups of distant pines against a golden background. A sense of perspective is created by the trees’ grouping and variation in size. The depiction is cropped by the edge of the fan which is typical of Rinpa composition.
title: Pine Trees
